reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 146/95: REMOVAL OF POWER - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF PEEL
reg_info.reg_name_text: REMOVAL OF POWER — REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF PEEL
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 146/95: REMOVAL OF POWER - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF PEEL
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. All authority of the council of The Regional Municipality of Peel given under subsection 51 (5) of the Act is hereby removed in respect of all applications for approval of a plan of subdivision or a condominium description made to the council on or after March 28, 1995 for land described in section 2. O. Reg. 146/95, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. All authority of the council of The Regional Municipality of Peel given under subsection 51 (5) of the Act is hereby removed in respect of all applications for approval of a plan of subdivision or a condominium description made to the council on or after March 28, 1995 for land described in section 2. O. Reg. 146/95, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Regulation applies to the area in the City of Mississauga in The Regional Municipality of Peel known as the Britannia Landfill Site and to those lands that are within 500 metres of that area, all of which is shown on a map filed with the Plans Administration Branch, Central and Southwest, of the Ministry of Municipal Affairs in Toronto as Number 180. O. Reg. 146/95, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. This Regulation applies to the area in the City of Mississauga in The Regional Municipality of Peel known as the Britannia Landfill Site and to those lands that are within 500 metres of that area, all of which is shown on a map filed with the Plans Administration Branch, Central and Southwest, of the Ministry of Municipal Affairs in Toronto as Number 180. O. Reg. 146/95, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 146/95, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 146/95, s. 3.
